scenes.background: Bob taps his pen on the table, looking at the group.
scenes.description: Are we sure this is the best course of action?

options.text: We need to consider all perspectives before moving forward.
options.analysis: You highlighted the importance of thorough consideration, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I think sticking to the plan is our best bet right now.
options.analysis: You emphasized the need to stick to the plan, showing strong motivation but a lack of emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Let's revisit our goals and see if this aligns.
options.analysis: You suggested aligning actions with goals, showing good emotional perception and empathy.
